mapper.select: select id,createUser,createTime,updateUser,updateTime, username,name,job,roleCode,phone from t_role order by id
select id,createUser,createTime,updateUser,updateTime, roleCode,roleName,roleDesc from t_user where username=#{username} and password=#{password}
select id,createUser,createTime,updateUser,updateTime, username,name,job,roleCode,phone,status from t_user where username=#{username}

select id,createUser,createTime,updateUser,updateTime, username,name,job,roleCode,phone,status from t_user where 1=1
and username like concat('%',#{username},'%')
and name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and job like concat('%',#{job},'%')
and roleCode=#{roleCode}
and phone like concat('%',#{phone},'%')
order by username
